main event: A witness reported observing a single unidentified object in Dayton, Ohio on September 8, 1961, which appeared to hover and changed colors.
interesting points: The object hovered for approximately 15-20 seconds and exhibited random movements,The witness described the object changing colors from red to blue to green,The sighting was part of a questionnaire filled out as part of Project Blue Book,The conclusions drawn from the observation suggested that it was likely a balloon or some atmospheric phenomenon,The report emphasized the need for further investigation due to insufficient data.
witness description: A civilian who saw the object from their location.
